TokTok is a Premium & High Quality UI Kit for Social Media & Messenger like Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok and WhatsApp with many features. TokTok came with unique style and niche, you can easily edit and customize all elements with design components which can speed up design process for your projects.


TokTok - Social Media App UI Kit is equipped with iOS/Android support (design system included) and 168 screens which is 100% editable & customizable. Designs are available in Figma. In addition, the design is also equipped with a version of Light & Dark Theme.


TokTok is designed in a trendy and modern way, with all layers well organized. TokTok is equipped with a design system with hundred of components. The Design System has been equipped with typography, iconography, color styles, components, elements, buttons, input forms, alerts, avatars, checkboxes, chips, grids, toggles, and many others.


In addition, the application design in figma has been designed with fully auto layout, so it is very adaptive if you want to edit, delete, or add some parts. If you are not familiar with auto layout, you can turn it off by right-clicking the layer, and selecting remove auto layout.


The design is available in my:

Gumroad | UI8


https://munirsr.gumroad.com/l/TokTok-SocialMediaAppUIKit


https://ui8.net/munirsr/products/toktok-social-media-app-ui-kit


TokTok UI Kit is suitable for:

  • Social Media App
  • Messenger App
  • Social App
  • Voice & Video App
  • Chatting App
  • Sharing App


Main App Features:

  • Upload & Publish (Post, Story, Shorts/Reels, Live)
  • Messenger Features (Chatting, Voice & Video Call)
  • Like, Comments, Share, Saved, & Many More Features
  • Search & Filter (Account, Audio, Hashtag, Location)
  • Story Features & Activity Track
  • All Instagram Main Features Included


Product Highlights:

  • 160+ Screens (iOS/Android Support)
  • 100% Editable & Customizable
  • Compatibility: Figma
  • Light & Dark Theme Included
  • Big Design System & Hundred of Components
  • Fully Auto Layout
  • Well Organized Layers System
  • Unique, Stylish & Modern
  • Used Google Free Fonts
  • Used Grid System
  • Pixel Perfect Design
  • Global Styleguide
  • Easily Drag & Drop Design


Note: All images/photos in the preview are included.
